SEARCH
Package com.group22.entities

Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
com.group22.entities.Entity
com.group22.entities.Zombie
public class Zombie extends Entity
The Zombie class extends the Entity class with properties and methods specific to zombies in the game. It manages zombie animations, movement, AI behavior, and interaction with the player and environment.

    • Zombie

      public Zombie(GamePanel gp, int zombieType)
      Constructor for the Zombie class.
      Parameters:
      gp - The GamePanel object that the zombie will interact with.
      zombieType - The type identifier for the zombie.

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      Sets the default values for the zombie's speed and initial direction. Zombie should be slower than the player.

    • setup

      public BufferedImage setup(String imageName)
      Loads and scales the image for the zombie.
      Parameters:
      imageName - Name of the image file.
      Returns:
      The scaled BufferedImage.

    • getZombieImage

      public void getZombieImage()
      Loads and sets up the zombie images for different directions and animations.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state and position of the zombie each frame. Handles collision detection, animation state, and direction logic for the Zombie.
      Specified by:
      update in class Entity

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the zombie on the screen.
      Specified by:
      draw in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g2 - Graphics2D object used for drawing.

    • setRemoveThis

      public void setRemoveThis(boolean status)
      Sets the status of whether this zombie should be removed.
      Parameters:
      status - The removal status of the zombie.

    • isRemoveThis

      public boolean isRemoveThis()
      Checks if this zombie is marked for removal.
      Returns:
      The removal status of the zombie.
